description: Retrieve health metrics like heart rate, blood pressure, weight, BMI, body fat percentage for analysis and tracking

metric_types.description: Types of metrics to retrieve (defaults to all)

start_date.description: Start date for metrics (YYYY-MM-DD, defaults to 30 days ago)

end_date.description: End date for metrics (YYYY-MM-DD, defaults to today)

include_trend.description: If true, include trend analysis (increasing, decreasing, stable)
